body_html: It looks like the pip is trying to remove an old version of a system library. To avoid version clashes, we recommend that you follow the virtualenv installation instructions.
body_text: It looks like the pip is trying to remove an old version of a system library. To avoid version clashes, we recommend that you follow the virtualenv installation instructions.
body: It looks like the `pip` is trying to remove an old version of a system library. To avoid version clashes, we recommend that you follow the [virtualenv installation instructions](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.8/get_started/os_setup.html#virtualenv-installation).
